about_the_game:
If you are enjoying Spirit City: Lofi Sessions and want to support further development of the game (and future games) then this Supporter Pack is for you!

Your support means the world to us, but please remember: there’s no obligation to purchase – your enjoyment of the game is our biggest reward!

This is a purely cosmetic bundle containing some unique skins for your favorite Spirits as a heartfelt thank you.

Included in this Supporter Pack

  • A gold "galaxy" skin for Lenny

  • One "galaxy" skin for every Spirit released up to update 1.5.0 - (20 total)

  • These skins are unlocked immediately without the need to purchase them with credits
